column1: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
Strive not to be a success
column2: but rather to be of value. - Albert Einstein

column1: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. - Eleanor Roosevelt
Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn. - Benjamin Franklin
Be the change that you wish to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi
